question: You have some documents that you need to be translated into another language as soon as possible. Write a letter to a translation agency. In your letter •	say what the documents are•	explain why you need them to be translated•	ask for the documents to be translated urgently
text: I am writing to require your services urgently. I have some important documents that need to be translated from English to Chinese.  Please find the attached 3 documents for your reference.

We are a pharmaceutical company and have finished manufacturing a new drug that helps prevent and minimize the symptoms of flu. A company from China has shown interest in our product and wishes to have details regarding the drug. Moreover, the documents that need to be translated are instructions for doctors on the usage of the drugs, ingredients and side effects with treatment.
This is an urgent request as the company would like the documents translated from English to Chinese. I know this is a bit of a rush but we will need it latest on Tuesday.
I am truly sorry for any inconvenience, I listed my contact details in the attached file. If you have any questions please feel free to contact me.
